subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams, who nearly became the first tennis player in more than a quarter-century to win all four Grand Slam tournaments in a season, was chosen as the Associated Press female athlete of the year for the fourth time.
snippet: Serena Williams, who nearly became the first tennis player in more than a quarter-century to win all four Grand Slam tournaments in a season, was chosen as the Associated Press female athlete of the year for the fourth time.
